qas.question: In what year was the foundation stone of New Delhi laid?
Who designed the foundation stone of the city of New Delhi?

answers.text: Sir Edwin Lutyens and Sir Herbert Baker

qas.question: On what date was New Delhi inaugurated?
Who inaugurated the city of New Delhi?

context: The foundation stone of the city was laid by George V, Emperor of India during the Delhi Durbar of <a0_0>1911<a0_0/>. It was designed by British architects, <a1_0>Sir Edwin Lutyens and Sir Herbert Baker<a1_0/>. The new capital was inaugurated on <a2_0>13 February 1931<a2_0/>, by India's <a3_0>Viceroy Lord Irwin<a3_0/>.
